---
title: "Fast Food"
description: |
  Analysis of Fast Food Calorie data from TidyTuesday
author: Josh Goldhaber
date: September 24, 2025
format: html
---


```{r}
library(tidyverse)

fastfood <- read_csv("data/fastfood_calories.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)

avg_cal <- fastfood %>%
  group_by(restaurant) %>%
  summarise(mean_calories = mean(calories, na.rm = TRUE),
            n_items = n()) %>%
  arrange(desc(mean_calories))

avg_cal %>%
  slice_head(n = 10) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = reorder(restaurant, mean_calories),
             y = mean_calories)) +
  geom_col(fill = "tomato") +
  coord_flip() +
  labs(
    title = "Top 10 Fast Food Chains by Average Calories per Menu Item",
    x = "Restaurant",
    y = "Average Calories"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()

```
